Saturday 16 September — 5:00PM

Dylan Moran

Bridget Christie

Ivo Graham

Ed Gamble

Star of Black Books, Shaun Of The Dead and Calvary - the Oscar Wilde of comedy, Dylan Moran returns to Greenwich Comedy Festival. Sell out worldwide tours have cemented this unkempt wordsmith’s reputation as one of the foremost comics of his generation.

Jokes as sharp as barbed wire and a comedy brain quicker than a steel trap The Scotsman
Joining Dylan is Edinburgh Comedy Award winner Bridget Christie plus quick witted Live At The Apollo star Ivo Graham and the irresistible Mock The Week-er Ed Gamble as host.
Festival Opens

3:30PM

Show Starts

5:00PM

Tickets

£20 - £25
